Name: Farofa
Description: A toasted mix of ground cassava and other veggies.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una mezcla tostada de mandioca molida y otras verduras.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 갈아놓은 카사바와 다른 야채들을 구워 섞은 것.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine geröstete Mischung aus gemahlenem Maniok und anderem Gemüse.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un mélange grillé de farine de manioc et d'autres légumes.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: キャッサバの粉末をあぶって他の野菜とあえたもの。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma mistura torrada de mandioca moída e outros vegetais.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Жареная смесь молотой маниоки и других овощей.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Yerden çıkmış manyoğun ve diğer sebzelerin kızarmış bir karışımı.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 奶油木薯粉。木薯粉和其他蔬菜的烘烤混合物。
